text: This article is a list of feature length movies and specials by the American animated studio Warner Bros. Animation, which is part of the Warner Bros. Television division of Warner Bros. Entertainment, owned by Warner Bros. Discovery. This includes animated feature movies, shorts, and specials. == Theatrical movies == === Released films === # Title Release Date Notes 1 Batman: Mask of the Phantasm December 25, 1993 2 Space Jam November 15, 1996 First original Looney Tunes feature. First movie from Warner Bros. Feature Animation. 3 Cats Don't Dance March 26, 1997 Produced by Turner Feature Animation. 4 Quest for Camelot May 15, 1998 First fully animated movie from Warner Bros. Feature Animation outside of Turner Feature Animation. 5 The Iron Giant August 6, 1999 Second and final fully animated movie from Warner Bros. Feature Animation. Only movie to use a WBFA logo. 6 Osmosis Jones August 10, 2001 Second live-action/animated movie from Warner Bros. Feature Animation. 7 Looney Tunes: Back in Action November 14, 2003 Third live-action/animated movie and final production from Warner Bros. Feature Animation. 8 The Lego Movie February 7, 2014 Produced by Warner Animation Group 9 Storks September 23, 2016 10 The Lego Batman Movie February 10, 2017 11 The Lego Ninjago Movie September 22, 2017 12 Teen Titans Go! To the Movies July 27, 2018 First theatrical movie to use a Warner Bros. Animation logo. 13 Smallfoot September 28, 2018 Produced by Warner Animation Group 14 The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part February 8, 2019 15 Scoob! May 15, 2020 15 Tom & Jerry February 26, 2021 16 Space Jam: A New Legacy July 16, 2021 17 DC League of Super-Pets July 29, 2022 === Upcoming === # Title Release date Notes 18 Coyote vs. Acme Unreleased Produced by Warner Bros.
